name: Paradise soldier
description:
ldier who did not want war, did not want to kill and always tried to help everyone. But fate decreed that he was hooked by fragments and he died. After he died, the god decided to give him a second chance and sent him to the battlefield, and said that if he helped cleanse the world of the dirt of the corpses of dead heroes (and not so),he will reward him with second life...
[CONTROLS]

[W][A][S][D] - Moving.
[LMB] - Shoot.
[E] - Take/Drop body.
[2] - Equip/Unequip weapon.(ONLY IF YOU HAVE IT)
